ISSUE.TITLE: Exclude GitHub content from CI checks
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Proposed Changes Exempt changes to GitHub issue templates from CI checks. ### Justification These have no impact on the application itself and exist merely to customize GitHub functionality.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix typo in Site Groups docs
